title: 向各位会创服的大神求助，喵~~~
author: eve_sasa
txt_content: 我自己创了个服，为什么指令各种不能用，连最平常的TP和sethome也不能用，是不是要加入什么，求助，喵~~[diamond_block]

replies.author: pkpkbo
replies.txt_content:
你的是什么插件都没么？
要装ESS基础插件额，。或者没给权限？

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 你输完指令后它提示什么

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
废话，所有的指令在这里，你自己看，其他的都需要插件
[INFO] /ban <name> [reason ...]
[INFO] /ban-ip <address|name> [reason ...]
[INFO] /banlist [ips|players]
[INFO] /debug
[INFO] /defaultgamemode <mode>
[INFO] /deop <player>
[INFO] /gamemode <mode> [player]
[INFO] /give <player> <item> [amount] [data]
[INFO] /help [page|command name]
[INFO] /kick <player> [reason ...]
[INFO] /kill
[INFO] /list
[INFO] /me <action ...>
[INFO] /op <player>
[INFO] --- Showing help page 3 of 4 (/help <page>) ---
[INFO] /pardon <name>
[INFO] /pardon-ip <address>
[INFO] /save-all
[INFO] /save-off
[INFO] /save-on
[INFO] /say <message ...>
[INFO] /seed
[INFO] /stop
[INFO] /time <set|add> <value>
[INFO] /toggledownfall
[INFO] /tp [target player] <destination player> OR /tp [target player] <x> <y> <z>
[INFO] /whitelist <on|off|list|add|remove|reload>
[INFO] /xp <amount> [player]
